scripts.build: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode=production --display=none && echo 'Build Successful!'
scripts.release: git checkout master && git pull origin master && npm run clean && npm run build && npm publish && echo 'Publish Successful!'
scripts.test: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=development webpack --mode=development --display=none && node dist/test && echo 'Tests Passed!'
